name: Core Equity Group
overview:
Since 2004, Core Equity Group has acted as an equity sponsor, investor, and advisor in early-mid stage venture companies, primarily in the technology and consumer industries.

CEG works with entrepreneurs and technologists to create and develop compelling businesses that have the ability to be successful in both their respective industry and capital markets. CEG applies institutional style discipline and preparation to lead its ventures throughout the corporate finance lifecycle. CEG partners work side by side with management to achieve mutual objectives and advance the businesses in which they are aligned. CEG principals have a unique mix of financial, strategic and operational expertise that provide value largely unattainable for early stage ventures.
